entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Cranbrook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 7:03 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Snow, -1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cranbrook Airport 9:52 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Snow
Temperature: -1.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 8:36 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:36 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 8:36 PM MST Friday 27 January 2023
